page.title: 07BROWNIES(etc) LIBRARY BRIDGE
page.content: There is a Recreation Ground in Bekesbourne where Bekesbourne Cricket Team plays cricket at the weekend. There is also a Village Hall. Brownie meetings are held there. There are also Brownie meetings in Bridge School on Thursday evenings. Thirty-eight girls from Bridge School go to Brownies.Twenty-seven boys go to Cubs, they meet in Bridge Village Hall Four girls from Bridge School go to Guides which are held in Bridge School Hall on Friday evenings. One boy from Bridge School goes to Scouts. They meet in Bridge Village Hall on Wednesday evenings. The Mobile Library comes to Bridge on Thursdays and to Bekesbourne on Mondays. I enjoy going to choose new books from the Mobile Library. Altogether 58 children from Bridge School use the Mobile Library.
